text: "Drive" is a 1992 song by alternative rock band R.E.M. and is the lead single to their eighth studio album Automatic for the People. It went to number 28 in the United States and number 11 in the United Kingdom. It went to the top ten in Canada, Greece, Ireland, New Zealand, Norway, Portugal and Switzerland. ==Track listings== All songs were written by Bill Berry, Peter Buck, Mike Mills, and Michael Stipe except where noted. title: Drive (R.E.M. song)
